name: Code 7
description: Code 7 is building a decentralized real estate investment platform. Building a community and monetary infrastructure through an algorithmic stablecoin protocol, the team has plans in the process of working with individual property owners around the world to redefine real estate through the beauty of decentralized finance. The project has launched 4 days ago and has a very active community. Through the entire "tomb fork" phase of DeFi, Code7 stands out with real-life utility. The team consists of positions relating to the real estate industry as we know it now, from those who have experience with mortgages, to law in real estate & DeFi, to general contractors, real estate agents, and so forth.
